scripts.build: del dist/* && tsc && node dist/index.js --color=true > dist/index.out
scripts.build:swc: del dist/* && swc ./src -d dist && node dist/index.js --color=true > dist/index.out
scripts.build:esbuild: del dist/* && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js && node dist/index.js --color=true > dist/index.out
